verses.name: Ezekiel 19:5
verses.text: Now when she saw that she had waited, and her hope was lost, then she took another of her whelps, and made him a young lion.

verses.name: Ezekiel 19:6
verses.text: And he went up and down among the lions, he became a young lion, and learned to catch the prey, and devoured men.

verses.name: Ezekiel 19:7
verses.text: And he knew their desolate palaces, and he laid waste their cities; and the land was desolate, and the fulness thereof, by the noise of his roaring.

verses.name: Ezekiel 19:8
verses.text: Then the nations set against him on every side from the provinces, and spread their net over him: he was taken in their pit.
